item.title: Mahe add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Mahe add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Mahe add a quote by Bumi manusia-Pramoedya Ananta Toer
item.description: "Berbahagialah dia yang makan dari keringatnya sendiri, bersuka karena usahanya sendiri, dan maju karena pengalamannya sendiri." -- Bumi manusia-Pramoedya Ananta Toer

item.title: Mahe add a quote by Isman H. Suryaman
item.description: "Finding a life partner is like choosing a bed. You need one as a friend either in times of health or sickness. Freshness or weariness. Happiness or sadness. And we can be certain that we've picked the right one without having to sleep with it first." -- Isman H. Suryaman

item.title: Mahe add a quote by Isman H. Suryaman
item.description: "A wise man (or the first comedian in history) once said, "If you wish to make God laugh, tell him your plans." This is why during praying, I occasionally slip in my business plans. If there were an internet of somekind in heaven, my story would've been forwarded to everyone even before lunch break." -- Isman H. Suryaman

item.title: Mahe add a quote by Henry Ward Beecherr
item.description: "Where is human nature so weak as in the bookstore?" -- Henry Ward Beecherr

item.title: Mahe add a quote by Bill Keane
item.description: "Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift of God, which is why we call it the present." -- Bill Keane

item.title: Mahe add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus
